rows.label: tlk41100123_02_msg0001
rows.name:
I heard the water tower over at
Kloom Farm got totally wrecked!

rows.label: tlk41100123_02_msg0002
rows.name:
And even worse, the army let
that baddie from Iira they'd
captured get away!

rows.label: tlk41100123_02_msg0003
rows.name:
How could they be so useless
when the Flamebringer was on
the scene and everything?

rows.label: tlk41100123_02_msg0004
rows.name: Is she not as strong as everyone says?

rows.label: tlk41100123_02_msg0005
rows.name:
My ma was getting really worried.
Telling me to watch myself because
those villains might still be nearby.

rows.label: tlk41100123_02_msg0006
rows.name:
Actually, you guys aren't from around
here either, are you? Haha, don't worry,
I can tell you're not dangerous.
